Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Lady Impa is standing on the ruins over
there. Don't mind me. Go see her!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Hm?<sp:5:1:0> Ah,<sp:5:0:0> Link!


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'd heard that you and Princess Zelda
had gone missing. I'm thrilled to see
you alive and well!
But where's Princess Zelda?
Talk02:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>What?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>So, Princess Zelda is still missing.<sp:5:1:0>
Well then, Link...

You may want to meet with <clr:0000>Lady Impa<clr:ffff>.


<sp:3:0:2:0700>She's investigating the <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff> that
have appeared across the landâ€”a curious
name for this strange phenomenon.
Lady Impa believes that they're crucial
to the search for Princess Zelda.

<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>She's traveling in one of those new
balloon contraptions and should be at
<clr:0000>New Serenne Stable <clr:ffff>right now.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'm in a hurry to meet with Lady Impa,
but I can't go anywhere nearly as fast as
she can in her balloon.
Let's see... <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable <clr:ffff>is just a
little to the northwest of central Hyrule.

If you'll excuse me, I need to be on
my way!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, Link! We meet again!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Have you found any clues as to where
Princess Zelda might be?

Lady Impa believes she has found a
source of information that might help
in the search for Princess Zelda.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd suggest that you go meet with
Lady Impa.

She should be at <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable <clr:ffff>in
North Hyrule Plain.

<sp:3:0:2:0300>I'm trying to reach her myself, but I'm
sorry to say that I'm so bad with
directions, I haven't gotten there yet.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I hope to get there soon though, so
forgive me if I excuse myself!
Talk21: <sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired>L...Lady Impa... I caught up with you...
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_01>Hmm?! You...<sp:5:1:0> You...<sp:5:0:0>are Link, right?


<sp:3:0:2:0100>Ha! I've been around a long time. You're
not going to fool me!

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_00>I'd heard that both you and Princess
Zelda had gone missing. I'm thrilled to
see you alive and well!
But where's Princess Zelda?
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, <sp:5:0:0>Link! I was finally able to make my
way to Lady Impa!
Talk23:
She is standing on the ruins over there.
Please, go see her.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>I'll join you both just as soon as I catch
my breath.
